name: DOT SWAP
description:
Directions: [Mouse Only]  Move your mouse left and right to match the two dots colors with the falling blocks colors.

Purple Dot should go through Purple Blocks and the Cyan Dot go through Cyan Blocks. 

Click to swap the colors of the dots.

DOT SWAP is a one button game developed with the CRISP game library. The music and sound effects are created by a random seed and by what appears on the screen, each run will sound a bit different.

CRISP Library: https://github.com/abagames/crisp-game-lib

Developed By:

Danny Baghdasarians
